commit.message:
re PR c++/22293 (ICE declaring destructor as friend)

	PR c++/22293
	* decl.c (grokdeclarator): Reject unqualified destructors in
	friend declarations.

	* g++.dg/other/friend3.C: New test.

From-SVN: r105564

+	* decl.c (grokdeclarator): Reject unqualified destructors in
+	friend declarations.
+
